name: Ca5p3r
desc: One of his first nicknames, it accurately described his earlier life. He was known to be a smiley kid, but disppear without any warning, like a friendly ghost or something. The 5 and 3 are symbolic of a time when he put his goal 400 meter time into his name in his younger years.

name: Chris
desc: The original nickname he was given, it's nothing more than a shorthand of his full government name Christopher. It can however, can have him be mistaken as a multitude of other full names as well.

name: C-2PO
desc: A more recent nickname, it sounds like a meshing together of the 2 iconic androids of the Star Wars franchise, R2D2 and C-3P0. He's still getting used to it, but it will probably be unique to the eROI family.

name: Polk
desc: One of his least favorite nicknames, it reminds him of the apparently shitty president, James K. Polk. He looks nothing like this random man, so this the budget option.

name: CP2
desc: The one his father gave him, it's a reminder in that he is the second, and hopefully better, edition of his older man. All the kid can do is hope for that to be true...
